body.data: Adding Bootsrap Icons to our project

data: To use the Bootstrap glyphicons, add the following line inside the <head> section of your HTML page: <link rel='stylesheet' href='https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css'> Note: No downloading or installation is required!
